BodLatMisB17.First Lines:
…wyth hym they shull be well a pay[ ]off yowre selff be not
                    dysmayd…

BLAdd35288.First Lines: Hoo so luste olde stories to redeHe sholle ffynde with owten drede…
BLAdd35288.Last Lines: …In which faire melior and her love hath beAnd þus Endeth þe Romans of partonope
BLAdd35288.Note: 12195 lines; a leaf missing after f. 19.
